verbs.description: < p > [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: told] [ARG2: House Republicans] [ARG1: he was " 1,000 percent " with them on rival immigration bills up for votes] , but it was not clear if he had a preference on how to handle family separations at the border.</p >

< p > President Donald Trump told House Republicans [ARG1: he] [V: was] [ARG2: " 1,000 percent " with them on rival immigration bills up for votes] , but it was not clear if he had a preference on how to handle family separations at the border.</p >

< p > President Donald Trump told House Republicans he was " 1,000 percent " with them on rival immigration bills up for votes , but it [V: was] [ARGM-NEG: not] [ARG2: clear] [ARG1: if he had a preference on how to handle family separations at the border.</p] >

< p > President Donald Trump told House Republicans he was " 1,000 percent " with them on rival immigration bills up for votes , but it was not clear if [ARG0: he] [V: had] [ARG1: a preference on how to handle family separations at the] border.</p >

< p > President Donald Trump told House Republicans he was " 1,000 percent " with them on rival immigration bills up for votes , but it was not clear if he had a preference on [ARGM-MNR: how] to [V: handle] [ARG1: family separations] [ARGM-LOC: at the] border.</p >
